name: Loop Friends
description:
A little loop friend has appeared on your space station. Help it find the other loop friends and save your Internet connection.

Controls:

WASD, Space: Movement

Mouse Wheel: Zoom in/out

Left-click: Throw Lupin

Right-click: Grapple, recall Lupin

Tips: you may have to throw Lupin onto things after doing a grapple jump. He can also phase through walls when you recall him with RMB.

Made in Godot for the Black & White Jam 2022.

BGM is "Daphe Dumpling" by Origami Repetika, used under CC BY 4.0: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Origami_Repetika/the-chiptunes-win-compilatio...
